Class GenericController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<PlayerMove>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GenericController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<MoveResponse>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrimaryController, RegistrationController, WelcomeController
public abstract class GenericController
extends Observable<PlayerMove>
implements Observer<MoveResponse>
